text.div:
CP_CRE (Tests for carbapenemase resistance mechanism)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    49617-4 Carbapenem resistance blaKPC gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    63368-5 Carbapenem resistance genes [Identifier] by NAA with probe detection
    73982-1 Carbapenem resistance blaNDM gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85498-4 Carbapenem resistance blaIMP gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85499-2 Carbapenem resistance blaKPC gene [Presence] by NAA with probe detection
    85500-7 Carbapenem resistance blaNDM gene [Presence] by NAA with probe detection
    85501-5 Carbapenem resistance blaVIM gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85503-1 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA-48 gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85788-8 Carbapenem resistance blaKPC gene [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture
    85823-3 Carbapenem resistance blaGES gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85824-1 Carbapenem resistance blaIMP gene [Presence] by NAA with probe detection
    85825-8 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA-23-like gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85826-6 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA-24-like gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85827-4 Carbapenem resistance bla OXA-48-like gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85828-2 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA-58-like gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85829-0 Carbapenem resistance blaSPM gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85830-8 Carbapenem resistance blaVIM gene [Presence] by NAA with probe detection
    85833-2 Carbapenem resistance blaGIM gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    86220-1 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA-48 gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    86712-7 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    86713-5 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA-134-like gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    86714-3 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA-51-like gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    88245-6 Carbapenem resistance blaIMP gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    88246-4 Carbapenem resistance blaKPC gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    88247-2 Carbapenem resistance blaNDM gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    88248-0 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    88249-8 Carbapenem resistance blaVIM gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    93390-3 Carbapenem resistance blaOXA-23-like+blaOXA-48-like genes [Presence] in Isolate or Specimen by Molecular genetics method
